attributes.action: Motor insurers should justify premiums particularly in light of whiplash reforms
attributes.background: Motor insurers have claimed that people will save £40 from their premiums as a result of increasing the small claims limit to £5,000.  However, the cost of insurance premiums has been rising yearly.  Coupled with the fact the government have announced an increase in IPT which will negate any saving.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on motor insurers, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
